mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_name, p.pro_desc, p.pro_location, p.word_name, pa.reason, pa.update_time, pa.approval_flag FROM project p, project_approval pa, tutor t WHERE p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pa.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND t.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pa.pro_id = p.pro_id AND pa.tutor_id = t.tutor_id AND p.pro_appr = 1 AND t.tutor_id = #{tutorId} ORDER BY pa.update_time DESC

SELECT p.pro_name, p.pro_location, p.word_name, pa.pa_id, t.tutor_name, pa.reason FROM project p, project_approval pa, tutor t WHERE pa.pro_id = p.pro_id AND pa.tutor_id - t.tutor_id AND pa.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND t.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pa.approval_flag = 1 AND pa.review = 0
